titleStmt.title: A solemne passion of the soules loue
Mary Magdalens love. Selections
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Simon Stafford [in the shop of Valentine Simmes] for William Barley, and are to be solde at his shop in Gratious street,

notesStmt.note: A reprint of part 2 of: Mary Magdalens love.
"The types and ornaments are those of Simmes"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
